title: Man accused of hiring £1,500 'hitman' to kill wife
description: Paul Lewis, 54, and Dominique Saunders, 35, deny conspiracy to murder at Swansea Crown Court
content:
Stephen Fairclough
A Swansea man accused of conspiring to have his estranged wife murdered paid £1,500 to a friend to hire a "hitman", a court has heard.
Paul Lewis, 54, from Fishmarket Quay, Swans… [+4272 chars]
